creditline: Gift of funds from Bob Ulrich and The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: birch log shaped like torso and legs; 1/4 spherical head; wood ring around proper left ankle with other rings around neck; round wood disk at top of chest
signed: On base and above ankle ring, in black ink: Mestach
text: When a shield is worn out, the framework remains.
title: Femme Ciblee (Bouleau)
